name: Ronny - Naz which WBS are list of VMs being charged to

content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    ResourceName
    ,[Date]
    ,Tags
    ,AdditionalInfo
    ,ResourceId
--FROM
--    OPENROWSET(
--        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/daily/ACMDailyActualCost/ACMDailyActualCost.parquet',
--        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
--    ) AS [result]

FROM [dbo].[Combined_Actual_Savings]

where 
--[Date] = '2023-02-06' 
MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' --and Tags like '%"CostAllocationType": "TOBESPECIFIED"%' 
    and UPPER(ResourceId) in (
    '/SUBSCRIPTIONS/061F6DAA-2AFE-427D-B3A5-A1919906D96F/RESOURCEGROUPS/CITRIX-XD-EEF89BD2-6D27-4BF6-95DA-AC4E20DC96A0-NNIFG/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.COMPUTE/VIRTUALMACHINES/MMP-TS4401',
    '/SUBSCRIPTIONS/061F6DAA-2AFE-427D-B3A5-A1919906D96F/RESOURCEGROUPS/CITRIX-XD-EEF89BD2-6D27-4BF6-95DA-AC4E20DC96A0-NNIFG/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.COMPUTE/VIRTUALMACHINES/MMP-TS4402',
    '/subscriptions/5f9dec8c-8bfd-40e1-b7c7-85fa538f77ed/resourceGroups/CITRIX-XD-A8EAF411-41E7-4C36-AFDB-0566B37EC488-4OVXF/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/MMP-TS4301',
    '/subscriptions/5f9dec8c-8bfd-40e1-b7c7-85fa538f77ed/resourceGroups/CITRIX-XD-A8EAF411-41E7-4C36-AFDB-0566B37EC488-4OVXF/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/MMP-TS4302',
    '/SUBSCRIPTIONS/5F9DEC8C-8BFD-40E1-B7C7-85FA538F77ED/RESOURCEGROUPS/CITRIX-XD-DE028C6C-1A1E-4370-9244-39C08AA856CE-C5Q51/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.COMPUTE/VIRTUALMACHINES/MMP-TS4201',
    '/SUBSCRIPTIONS/5F9DEC8C-8BFD-40E1-B7C7-85FA538F77ED/RESOURCEGROUPS/CITRIX-XD-DE028C6C-1A1E-4370-9244-39C08AA856CE-C5Q51/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.COMPUTE/VIRTUALMACHINES/MMP-TS4202',
    '/SUBSCRIPTIONS/5F9DEC8C-8BFD-40E1-B7C7-85FA538F77ED/RESOURCEGROUPS/CITRIX-XD-DE028C6C-1A1E-4370-9244-39C08AA856CE-C5Q51/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.COMPUTE/VIRTUALMACHINES/MMP-TS4203',
    '/SUBSCRIPTIONS/5F9DEC8C-8BFD-40E1-B7C7-85FA538F77ED/RESOURCEGROUPS/CITRIX-XD-DE028C6C-1A1E-4370-9244-39C08AA856CE-C5Q51/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.COMPUTE/VIRTUALMACHINES/MMP-TS4204',
    '/SUBSCRIPTIONS/5F9DEC8C-8BFD-40E1-B7C7-85FA538F77ED/RESOURCEGROUPS/CITRIX-XD-DE028C6C-1A1E-4370-9244-39C08AA856CE-C5Q51/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.COMPUTE/VIRTUALMACHINES/MMP-TS4205',
    '/SUBSCRIPTIONS/5F9DEC8C-8BFD-40E1-B7C7-85FA538F77ED/RESOURCEGROUPS/CITRIX-XD-DE028C6C-1A1E-4370-9244-39C08AA856CE-C5Q51/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.COMPUTE/VIRTUALMACHINES/MMP-TS4206',
    '/SUBSCRIPTIONS/5F9DEC8C-8BFD-40E1-B7C7-85FA538F77ED/RESOURCEGROUPS/CITRIX-XD-DE028C6C-1A1E-4370-9244-39C08AA856CE-C5Q51/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.COMPUTE/VIRTUALMACHINES/MMP-TS4207',
    '/SUBSCRIPTIONS/5F9DEC8C-8BFD-40E1-B7C7-85FA538F77ED/RESOURCEGROUPS/CITRIX-XD-DE028C6C-1A1E-4370-9244-39C08AA856CE-C5Q51/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.COMPUTE/VIRTUALMACHINES/MMP-TS4208',
    '/SUBSCRIPTIONS/5F9DEC8C-8BFD-40E1-B7C7-85FA538F77ED/RESOURCEGROUPS/CITRIX-XD-DE028C6C-1A1E-4370-9244-39C08AA856CE-C5Q51/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.COMPUTE/VIRTUALMACHINES/MMP-TS4209',
    '/SUBSCRIPTIONS/5F9DEC8C-8BFD-40E1-B7C7-85FA538F77ED/RESOURCEGROUPS/CITRIX-XD-DE028C6C-1A1E-4370-9244-39C08AA856CE-C5Q51/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.COMPUTE/VIRTUALMACHINES/MMP-TS4210',
    '/SUBSCRIPTIONS/5F9DEC8C-8BFD-40E1-B7C7-85FA538F77ED/RESOURCEGROUPS/CITRIX-XD-DE028C6C-1A1E-4370-9244-39C08AA856CE-C5Q51/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.COMPUTE/VIRTUALMACHINES/MMP-TS4211',
    '/SUBSCRIPTIONS/5F9DEC8C-8BFD-40E1-B7C7-85FA538F77ED/RESOURCEGROUPS/CITRIX-XD-DE028C6C-1A1E-4370-9244-39C08AA856CE-C5Q51/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.COMPUTE/VIRTUALMACHINES/MMP-TS4212',
    '/SUBSCRIPTIONS/5F9DEC8C-8BFD-40E1-B7C7-85FA538F77ED/RESOURCEGROUPS/CITRIX-XD-DE028C6C-1A1E-4370-9244-39C08AA856CE-C5Q51/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.COMPUTE/VIRTUALMACHINES/MMP-TS4213')
    order by [Date]
